title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-1 - Tompa Bay A Success, Josh Allen MVP, Doug Gottlieb on LeBron
itunes:title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-1 - Tompa Bay A Success, Josh Allen MVP, Doug Gottlieb on LeBron
description:
In Hour 1 of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin aims to convince us that Tom Brady's first year in Tampa Bay was an overall success--even if the Buccaneers don't win the Super Bowl. And one Hall of Fame quarterback has the perfect remedy for insomnia in Dallas. Also, Colin urges NFL voters to consider Buffalo quarterback Josh Allen for MVP. Plus, FOX Sports Radio host Doug Gottlieb drops in to share his observations on Lakers' star LeBron James following a championship season in Los Angeles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
